```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r one}
library(tidyverse)
readr::read_csv(
 here::here( "data/pets", "NYC_Dog_Licensing_Dataset.csv"
  )) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() -> dogs
```
what name is the most common?
```{r}
dogs%>%
count(animal_name)%>%
  arrange(-(n))
```
```{r}
dogs%>%
  filter(animal_name != "UNKNOWN" & animal_name != "NAME NOT PROVIDED") -> dogs2
```
```{r}
dogs2%>%
  count(animal_name)%>%
  arrange(-n)
```
```{r}
dogs2 %>%
  mutate(
    animal_name = stringr::str_to_title(animal_name)
    ) -> dogs2
dogs2 %>%
  count(animal_name) %>%
  arrange(-n)
```
```{r}
dogs2%>%
  count(animal_name, zip_code)%>%
  arrange(-n)
```
